remarks: Well-Founded Induction Schema.  If all elements less than a given set ` x ` of the well-founded class ` A ` have a property (induction hypothesis), then all elements of ` A ` have that property. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 29-Jan-2011.)
statement:
wfis.1 $e |- R We A $.
wfis.2 $e |- R Se A $.
wfis.3 $e |- ( y e. A -> ( A. z e. Pred ( R , A , y ) [. z / y ]. ph -> ph ) ) $.
wfis $p |- ( y e. A -> ph ) $.
$d A y $.
$d A y z $.
$d R y $.
$d R y z $.
$d ph z $.
